items.title: New York City under travel advisory as Northeast braces for flooding
items.description: The Interstate 95 corridor from New York City to Washington, D.C., is bracing for dangerous flooding on Thursday.

items.title: Key US inflation gauge rose last month as Trump's tariffs lifted goods prices
items.description: The Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation gauge ticked higher last month in a sign that President Donald Trump’s broad-based tariffs are starting to l...

items.title: WATCH:  Supersized stick insect discovered in Australia
items.description: Scientists in Australia have discovered a giant new species of stick insect, which is over 15 inches long.

items.title: Trump admin lifted sanctions on Israeli accused of killing Palestinian activist
items.description: President Joe Biden sanctioned Yinon Levi in 2024 for violence against Palestinians.

items.title: WATCH:  Kamala Harris says she won't run for governor of California in 2026
items.description: Former Vice President Kamala Harris announced Wednesday that she won’t run for California governor in 2026.
